Identity.Name: Alaestoes, The Celintran Bow
Identity.Basic_Description: Heavily Clad archer with a hood in robes with aura bow

Abilities.Name: Phased-Arrow
Abilities.Ability: Cost 1 energy: This units next attack does not need line of site. This ability can only be used once per turn.

Abilities.Name: Phase
Abilities.Ability: When using 'Sprint', Archers of Celintra can move through objects as long as they end their movement in a valid location.
